entry.value: # Copy input to output%%00010#output_table_1 = input_table_1.copy()%%00010%%00010%%00010import bs4%%00010import pandas as pd%%00010import requests%%00010%%00010%%00010def fetchUrl(url):%%00010%%00009'''%%00010%%00009功能%%65306访问 url 的网页%%65292获取网页内容并返回%%00010%%00009参数%%65306目标网页的 url%%00010%%00009返回%%65306目标网页的 html 内容%%00010%%00009'''%%00010%%00009%%00010%%00009headers = {%%00010%%00009%%00009'accept': 'text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8',%%00010%%00009%%00009'user-agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/68.0.3440.106 Safari/537.36',%%00010%%00009}%%00010%%00009%%00010%%00009r = requests.get(url,headers=headers)%%00010%%00009r.raise_for_status()%%00010%%00009r.encoding = r.apparent_encoding%%00010%%00009return r.text%%00010%%00010'''%%00010%%00009功能%%65306获取当天报纸的各版面的链接列表%%00010%%00009参数%%65306年%%65292月%%65292日%%00010%%00009''' %%00010linkList = []%%00010for i in range(len(input_table_1)):%%00010%%00009year = str(input_table_1['Year'][i])%%00010%%00009month = input_table_1['Month (number)'][i]%%00010%%00009day = input_table_1['Day of month'][i]%%00010%%00010%%00009if month<10 :%%00010%%00009%%00009month = '0'+str(month)%%00010%%00009else:%%00010%%00009%%00009month = str(month)%%00010%%00009if day<10 :%%00010%%00009%%00009day = '0'+str(day)%%00010%%00009else:%%00010%%00009%%00009day = str(day)%%00010%%00009%%00010#%%00009print(day)%%00010#%%00009print(type(day))%%00010%%00009url = 'http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/' + year + '-' + month + '/' + day + '/nbs.D110000renmrb_01.htm'%%00010%%00009print(url)%%00010%%00009html = fetchUrl(url)%%00010%%00009bsobj = bs4.BeautifulSoup(html,'html.parser')%%00010%%00010%%00010%%00009pageList = bsobj.findAll(id="pageLink")%%00010%%00009%%00010%%00009%%00010%%00009for page in pageList:%%00010%%00009%%00009link = page.get('href')%%00010%%00009%%00009link = link[link.index('nbs'):]%%00010%%00009%%00009print(link)%%00010%%00009%%00009url = 'http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/' + year + '-' + month + '/' + day + '/' + link%%00010%%00009%%00009linkList.append(url)%%00010%%00010print(linkList)%%00010items = pd.DataFrame(linkList,columns=['links'])%%00010output_table_1 = items
